name: NFDI4Health_LM_MDS_Core
title: NFDI4Health LM Core Metadataschema V3.3
description: NFDI4Health Logical Model Core Metadataschema V3.3

element.definition: NFDI4Health Logical Model Core Metadataschema V3.3

Group of items providing information about a resource. Resources can be, for example, files or parts of them (e.g. datasets or study documents such as study protocols or questionnaires) or also studies or substudies.
Unique identifier of the resource used for identification within the NFDI4Health.
element.comment: Additional information: The identifier is assigned automatically.

element.definition: Group of items providing information about the classification of the resource within the predefined categories.
A term describing the resource.
element.comment: Additional information: The selected resource type determines which information will be asked next.

element.definition: Specific information about the form in which the [RESOURCE] is available.
element.comment:
Additional information: If the [RESOURCE] consists primarily of words for reading and is not covered by another textual resource type in this list, 'Text' should be used instead of 'Other'.

* 1..1M 1..1, if Resource.classification.type != ("Study" OR "Substudy" OR "Dataset" OR "Registry" OR "Secondary data source"); otherwise 0..0

element.definition: Group of items providing information about title(s)/name(s) of the [RESOURCE].
Scientific unabbreviated title or name of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional information: If no official title/name has been defined yet, a title/name that is suitable for public display should be used.

element.definition: Language in which the title/name is provided.
Group of items providing information about acronym(s) of the [RESOURCE].
If existing, acronym(s) of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional information: The field refers primarily to resources which have an acronym.

element.definition: Language in which the acronym is provided.
Group of items providing information about the description(s) of the [RESOURCE].
Short plain text summary of the [RESOURCE].
Language in which the description text is provided.
Group of items providing information about keywords describing the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional information: The findability of the [RESOURCE] can be significantly increased if proper keywords are stated.

element.definition: Keyword(s) describing the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional information: The use of terms from established classifications/vocabularies (e.g. SNOMED CT, MeSH, UMLS) is preferred. However, also self-assigned keywords are allowed.

element.definition: If known, the code of the keyword in the classification/vocabulary used.
Language(s) in which the   [RESOURCE] is conducted/provided.
If existing, a link to the web page directly relevant to the  [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional information: Other web pages related to the [RESOURCE] can additionally be entered in the section 'Related resources'.

element.definition: Group of items applicable only to resource types other than a study/substudy, a dataset, a registry, or a secondary data source.
element.comment: * 1..1M 1..1, if Resource.classification.type != ("Study" OR "Substudy" OR "Registry" OR "Secondary data source"); otherwise 0..0

element.definition: If applicable, the version number of the  [RESOURCE].
If applicable, the file format of the  [RESOURCE] (e.g., XML, PDF, XLSX, etc.).
Group of items providing information about the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].
License defining the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].
**Description:** Link to the selected license.
Group of items applicable only if a Creative Commons license is selected.
element.comment: Additional information: In order to successfully publish the [RESOURCE] under the respective license, all four questions ought to be confirmed.

element.definition: Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have authority to license it.
Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have read and understood the terms of the chosen license.
Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is not revocable.
element.comment: Additional information: The [RESOURCE] can be licensed using a CC-license only if it is free of the third-party rights.

element.definition: Confirmation that NFDI4Health is allowed to license the document, i.e. to mark the [RESOURCE] with the license information.
Any additional descriptive information explaining terms and conditions to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional information: If 'Other' is selected in the field 'License', the preferred license or terms and conditions for (re-)use should be specified here.

element.definition: Group of items providing information about person(s), group(s) of persons or institution(s)/organisation(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional information: For each [RESOURCE], there may be multiple contributors, but at least one person, group of persons or institution/organisation must be specified.

element.definition: Indication whether the contribution was made by person(s) or organisation(s)/institution(s)/group(s).
Group of items providing information about group(s) of persons, institution(s) or organisation(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].
element.comment:
Additional information: Group of items applicable only when providing organisational, institutional or group names.

* 1..1M 1..1, if Resource.contributors.nameType == "Organisational"; otherwise 0..0

element.definition: Contributor type an organisation, institution or group fulfills. For example, this can be a sponsor of the study or a group of authors of the document.
Identifier(s) assigned by a funder to the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: * 0..* 0..*, if Resource.contributors.organisational.type == ("Funder (public)" OR "Funder (private)"); otherwise 0..0

element.definition: Name of the organisation, institution or group.
Group of items providing information about person(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].
element.comment:
Additional information: Group of items applicable only when providing person names.

* 1..1M 1..1, if Resource.contributors.nameType == "Personal"; otherwise 0..0

element.definition: Contributor type a person fulfills. For example, this can be a principal investigator of a study or an author of a document.
Given name of the person.
Family name(s) of the person.
Group of items providing information about digital identifiers of the person.
Digital identifier according to a specific scheme that uniquely identifies the person.
Type of the identifier scheme reported.
Email address of the  person, group of persons or institution/organisation.
Phone number of the  person, group of persons or institution/organisation.
Group of items providing further information about the organisation(s) associated with the contributor.
Name of the organisation associated with the contributor.
Address of the organisation associated with the contributor.
Web page of the organisation associated with the contributor.
Group of items providing information about identifiers of the organisation.
Digital identifier according to a specific scheme that uniquely identifies the organisation.
Type of the identifier scheme reported.
Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) assigned to the given [RESOURCE] by another registering systems, e.g. a registry of clinical trials or a data repository.
Type/name of the system where the given [RESOURCE] is already registered.
Identifier (ID) assigned to the given [RESOURCE] by another registering system, e.g. by a registry of clinical trials or a data repository.
Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) of the resources related to the given [RESOURCE], e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents or links to web pages.
Identifier (ID) related to, or associated with, the [RESOURCE] being registered. These can be IDs of related publications, datasets, study documents, web pages, etc.
element.comment:
Additional information: a) Publications like journal articles usually have a DOI, e.g. 10.3238/arztebl.2020.0861.
b) A link (URL) starting with 'http(s)://' to a web page with any additional information can also be provided.

element.definition: Type of the identifier of the related resource.
Relationship between the [RESOURCE] being registered (A) and the related resource (B).
Type of the related resource, e.g. journal article, dataset, text, etc.
Group of items providing information about related resources (e.g. (sub-)studies, study documents, etc.) registered on this portal.
element.comment: Additional information: Does the [RESOURCE] have any related resources registered on this portal?

element.definition: Identifier (ID) of the related resource assigned on this portal.
**Description:** Date when the identifier of the related resource was assigned.
element.comment: Additional information: Preferred date format: DD.MM.YYYY.

element.definition: Relationship between the [RESOURCE] being registered (A) and the related resource (B).
Indication whether the [RESOURCE] collects nutritional data.
element.comment: * 1..1M 1..1, if Resource.classification.type == ("Study" OR "Substudy") AND Resource.provenance.dataSource == "Manually collected"; otherwise 0..0

element.definition: Indication whether the [RESOURCE] addresses chronic diseases.
element.comment: * 1..1M 1..1, if Resource.provenance.dataSource == "Manually collected"; otherwise 0..0

element.definition: Group of items providing information about provenance aspects of the data entry on this portal.
Source of information about the [RESOURCE] and the way it was uploaded/collected.
Date on which the responsible party last verified the information about the [RESOURCE], even if no additional or updated information is being submitted.
User who last verified the information about the [RESOURCE].
Date when the [RESOURCE] was first submitted for publication.
User who first submitted the [RESOURCE] for publication.
Date when the [RESOURCE] was first posted/published.
User who first posted/published the [RESOURCE].
Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was submitted for publication.
User who submitted the last update of the [RESOURCE].
Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was posted/published.
User who posted/published the last update of the [RESOURCE].
Version number of the [RESOURCE] within this portal.
